document.full_text: facebook has hired a member of google inc's corporate development team to lead its fledgling merger and acquisition efforts, as the world's no. 1 internet social network shows an increasing appetite for deals.
document.title: facebook hires google exec to lead m&a efforts
lines_and_colors: facebook has hired a member of google inc's corporate development team to lead its fledgling merger and acquisition efforts, as the world's no. 1 internet social network shows an increasing appetite for deals.
